text: It’s great seeing such great quality vegetables and fruits being sold jn the heartland. And at heartland price. It’s my usual go to for HUGE crunchy and sweet green grapes, seasonal fruits such as Australian white peaches, uber fresh salads and baby spinach; not to mention the heirloom tomatoes! Keep it up!

The fruit shop is a beloved spot for lower-income families, known for its friendly and polite cashier. The selection of juicy fruits and fresh produce is top-notch, making it a go-to destination for those looking for quality at affordable prices. A visit to this shop is sure to leave customers satisfied and eager to return.
龙马精神，财源广进!

This is about this store as a Shopee parcel collection point. The smaller, skinnier uncle and one auntie were very very pleasant to interact with. Perhaps they are the shopowners. Good for them 👍🏻

But there's this taller, plump young guy who is very unpleasant — he has a "don't bother me" attitude during collection, as if we are the ones at fault to collect our parcels from him. Please go find your dream job, or work with machines if you can't offer decent customer service! It's a shame to have you tending the store.
Extensive range of veggies. Most of them affordable. Well packed & clean. Only accepts cash 👍🏻
Excellent service, all the fruits are very fresh. They have all the necessary goods, very convenient and comprehensive.
